org.mindswap.owl
Interface OWLTransformator

public interface OWLTransformator

Transformators are used to transform arbitrary objects to and from OWL data values or OWL individuals. Note that this includes the special case where the object is also a OWL data value or OWL individual.

We may also say that a transformator mediates between two different representations of some data. Most likely this transformation happens on a syntactical level only, that is, maintaining the semantics of the data. Nevertheless, it is also imaginable that a transformator not only mediates different syntactical representations but would also change the semantics of the data as part of the transformation process. The current contract of this interface does not define how far this transformation process can go. This is up to actual implementations.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object fromOWL(OWLValue source, OWLModel model)
          Transform a OWL data value respectively individual into another representation.
 OWLValue toOWL(java.lang.Object source, OWLModel model)
          Transform some object into an OWL data value respectively individual.
 

Method Detail

toOWL

OWLValue toOWL(java.lang.Object source,
               OWLModel model)
               throws TransformationException
Transform some object into an OWL data value respectively individual.

Parameters:
source - The source object to transform.
model - Optional OWL model possibly required to guide the transformation process. Usage is optional and depends on the actual transformator, that is, can be left null.
Returns:
The source object transformed into another representation.
Throws:
TransformationException - In case transformation failed (for whatever reason).

fromOWL

java.lang.Object fromOWL(OWLValue source,
                         OWLModel model)
                         throws TransformationException
Transform a OWL data value respectively individual into another representation.

Parameters:
source - The source OWL object to transform.
model - Optional OWL model possibly required to guide the transformation process. Usage is optional and depends on the actual transformator, that is, can be null.
Returns:
The source object transformed into another representation.
Throws:
TransformationException - In case transformation failed (for whatever reason).
